summary: Kids math learning web app with age-group selection, pastel (non-bold) styling, animated picture, and sticker/sticker-board rewards for completing levels.
known_issues: After restore/redeploy, the age-groups section is missing.
After restore/redeploy, UI styling reverted (bold text instead of pastel theme).
After restore/redeploy, the animated picture is missing.
Sticker/sticker-board reward functionality appears missing or not present after restore/redeploy.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Sticker board background illustration, bright pastel, kid-friendly, with empty sticker slots (sticker-board-bg.dim_1200x800.png)

existing_features.title: Restore the Age Groups section so children can always access and use age-group selection (5–6, 7–8, 9–10). Ensure the Home flow and any guards reliably route users to the Age Select screen when no age group is selected, and that the Age Select screen renders the full set of age-group cards.

Re-apply the intended kid-friendly pastel styling across the app and remove the unintended ‘bold’ look regression. Keep text high-contrast/legible, but ensure the overall look is soft pastel rather than harsh/bold, matching the existing theme tokens and design direction.
Restore the animated picture/mascot experience on key screens by ensuring the mascot renders and its animations work (idle float, cheer bounce-in, encourage wiggle) wherever it is already used.

Restore/ensure the sticker rewards system and add a sticker-board style view so that completing a level awards a sticker and the child can view earned stickers on a dedicated sticker board (a chart/board presentation, not just a plain list). Define level completion as reaching the Round Summary screen (existing behavior), and keep rewards persisted between sessions for anonymous users.

Create and apply a single, consistent visual theme pass for the restored screens (Age Select, Home, Round Summary rewards moment, Progress sticker board) so the app feels cohesive and kid-friendly (soft pastels, rounded shapes, playful typography), and enforce it consistently.

new_feature_requests.summary: Sticker rewards: earn stickers for completing levels and display them on a sticker board

projectName: Restore age-group selection UI, pastel theme + animated mascot, and sticker-board rewards
